  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_b6ed7b76586e2bf05364f4c4e8e068d3ee62e597</entry>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_b6ed7b76586e2bf05364f4c4e8e068d3ee62e597</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Planar reflection of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planare Reflexion des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion planaire de lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão planar da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione planare di luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίπεδη αντανάκλαση του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión planar de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a ray of light originating from a point located in front of a plane mirror.  This can be used in a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">angle of reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ray of light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt einen Strahl des Lichtes 
entstehend von einem Punkt, der vor einem flachen Spiegel gelegen ist.
Dieses kann in einer beschriftenden Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre un rayon de lumière provenant 
d'un point situé devant un miroir plat. Ceci peut être 
utilisé dans un exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra um raio da luz que origina de 
um ponto situado na frente de um espelho plano. Isto pode ser 
usado em um exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra un raggio di luce che proviene
da un punto situato davanti uno specchio piano. Ciò può essere
usata in un'esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει μια ακτίνα του φωτός που 
προέρχεται από ένα σημείο που βρίσκεται μπροστά από έναν 
καθρέφτη αεροπλάνων. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια 
άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra un rayo de la luz que origina
de una punta situada delante de un espejo plano. Esto se puede 
utilizar en un ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkel der Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahl des Lichtes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">angle de réflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">miroir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayon de lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo de reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raio da luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo della riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">raggio di luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
